member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH
member.summary: A FLASH module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH.WriteEnable
member.summary: Attempts to enable writing to the flash.
member.returns: If writing is enabled or not.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH.GetIdentification
member.summary: Gets the ID of the chip.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH.IsWriteInProgress
member.summary: Checks if a write is in progress.
member.returns: Whether or not a write is in progress.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH.EraseBlock(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: The block to begin erasing at.
The number of blocks to erase.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH.EraseSector(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: The sector to begin erasing at.
The number of sectors to erase.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH.Write(System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Writes data to a specific address.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH.Write(System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes data to a specific address.
member.param: The offset to begin writing from.
The nubmer of bytes to write.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH.Read(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads data from the specific address.
member.param: The number of bytes to read.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH.ReadFast(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads data from a specific address in fast mode.
